extension.name: MailChimp
extension.description: Subscribe users to a MailChimp mailing list

releases.release: - Update for 4.x
- Fix an error with the core JSONPage
- Updated MailChimp API to 3.0 - Added check and custom error when email already in list - Changed subscription call to add email to list or update if already in list
- Fixed issue with namespace of Class 'Drewm\MailChimp' not found (again) - Updated submodule drewm/mailchimp-api to latest version - Added support to subscribe to multiple lists
- Fixed issue with email already subscribed API response - Fixed issue with namespace of Class 'Drewm\MailChimp' not found
- Fixed issue with renamed core method (saveConfig -> write)
- Updated submodule drewm/mailchimp-api to latest version - Added js snippet in the readme
- Updated MailChimp API to 2.0 - Allow overwriting of List ID (used as default) - Update of Event to return similar fields to Symphony events
- Fixed Ajax issue (nitriques)
- Added support for redirect on success.
- Fix a bug to handle `&` from MailChimp in error messages.
- Fix a bug where $output could be `mixed` (Thanks nitriques).
- A couple bug fixes including [issue #3](https://github.com/lewiswharf/mailchimp/issues/3).
- Ajax bug fix.
- Ajax capability added (Thanks nitriques).
- Switched from login/password to using the API key for authentication. MailChimp has deprecated the former. Clarified directions regarding merge fields.
- Updated wrapper for API 1.3
- Fixed bug to allow email address only form
- Updated for Symphony 2.2 and increased flexibility to handle infinite merge fields.
- Initial build
